column2: A dwarf warrior has arrived at your court.
A dwarf steward has arrived at your court.
An elf spy has arrived at your court.
An elf lass has arrived at your court.
It seems that my kindness toward dwarf folks has come to the attention to a dwarf within the realm. We met and shared a few drinks and had the great time.
It seems that my respect toward the old elven culture has come to the attention to a n elf within the realm. We met and had the most enlightening discussion.
